fields.name: Estoc
fields.description: A long thing blade meant for thrusting. Has a melee attack range one grid space farther than normal.

fields.name: Eagle Hilt Sword
fields.description: A light katana with an eagle head fashioned to its hilt. Cuts the air into deadly projectiles.

fields.name: Nodachi
fields.description: A long katana which is drawn into a combination of slashes. Has an innate 10 foot maxi- mum range due to its length.

fields.name: Uchigatana
fields.description: A frail but deadly katana. Takes one extra durability damage from all sources.

fields.name: Black Steel Katana
fields.description: A heavy katana, made from for- eign metal.

fields.name: Scimitar
fields.description: A bladed sword with a single curved edge. Its attacks flow well into one another.

fields.name: Twin Curved Swords
fields.description: A pair of matching curved swords meant to be wielded with one in each hand. A strong curve makes them harder to handle.

fields.name: Thirsting Khopesh
fields.description: A forward curved blade with sickle like appearance. Thirsts for the life force of all creatures, including its wielder.

fields.name: Falchion
fields.description: A single edged curved sword of heavier make. Cuts strong and True, pulling the very wind as it does.

fields.name: Hunting Saif (Curved Sword)
fields.description: A curved sickle which can be snapped into a collapsing handle to form a reaper. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the reaper form of this weapon, hits all grid spaces in a cone up to your max range. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the curved sword form of this weapon, allows you to move up to two grid spaces for no cost before making the attack.

fields.name: Hunting Saif (Reaper)
fields.description: A curved sickle which can be snapped into a collapsing handle to form a reaper. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the reaper form of this weapon, hits all grid spaces in a cone up to your max range. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the curved sword form of this weapon, allows you to move up to two grid spaces for no cost before making the attack.

fields.name: Claymore
fields.description: A versatile but large sword. Traditionally used with two hands.

fields.name: Undead Slayer
fields.description: Specially crafted sword of odd dark metal. Deals one extra damage die of damage to fully undead enemies.

fields.name: Black Crest Sword
fields.description: Made for facing foes larger than oneself. When an attack deals maximum damage with this weapon, the targets stance is broken and they lose 1d2 FP.

fields.name: Sapphire Jeweled Sword
fields.description: A blade imbued with magic. An ornate but brittle weapon. Takes double durability damage.

fields.name: Moonlight Greatsword
fields.description: A legendary blade of the moonlight. The weapon skill Airblade Slice creates a magical projectile when used with this weapon, dealing magic damage.

fields.name: Double Decimator (Greatsword)
fields.description: A wide blade greatsword that splits and seperates into a twinblade. Making an attack in the twinblade form of the weapon before immidiately swapping to the greatsword form allows you to initiate a heavy attack for no additional AP, instead of per- forming a trick weapon swap attack. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the twinblade form of this weapon, causes the attack to target all adjacent grid spaces.

fields.name: Double Decimator (Twinblade)
fields.description: A wide blade greatsword that splits and seperates into a twinblade. Making an attack in the twinblade form of the weapon before immidiately swapping to the greatsword form allows you to initiate a heavy attack for no additional AP, instead of per- forming a trick weapon swap attack. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the twinblade form of this weapon, causes the attack to target all adjacent grid spaces.

fields.name: Greatsword
fields.description: An over sized sword. Virtually unwieldable.

fields.name: Shining Knight Greatsword
fields.description: A massive blade that crackles with lightning, but can also ex- tend with magical power

fields.name: Black Crypt Sword
fields.description: A old dark mass of stone. Taken from its forsaken resting place.

fields.name: Ruined Elite Greatsword
fields.description: A thin and massively long blade with a dull base. Used to crush foes and charge into battle

fields.name: Forked Heavy Flamberge
fields.description: A quick and deadly axe for a cunning thief. Grants one free space of movement once per combat.

fields.name: Hand Axe
fields.description: A small axe meant for quick chopping.

fields.name: Battle Axe
fields.description: An axe fit for battle. Inflicts heavy blows but with slower swings.

fields.name: Thieves Axe
fields.description: A quick and deadly axe for a cunning thief. Grants one free space of movement once per combat.

fields.name: Highland Cleaver
fields.description: A weighty cleaver. Rends through flesh and stone with reckless abandon.

fields.name: Demons Axe
fields.description: Axe made of an ancient demons horn. Drips with flames

fields.name: Flowing Scepter (Axe)
fields.description: A mercuric silver weapon which can morph into one of two forms based on its wielders de- sire. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the hammer form of this weapon, increases the range of the attack by ten feet and causes it to hit all grid spaces in a line up to its maxi- mum range.

fields.name: Flowing Scepter (hammer)
fields.description: A mercuric silver weapon which can morph into one of two forms based on its wielders de- sire. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the hammer form of this weapon, increases the range of the attack by ten feet and causes it to hit all grid spaces in a line up to its maxi- mum range.

fields.name: Great Axe
fields.description: Only those with inhuman strength can chop with a piece of metal this large.

fields.name: Great Machete
fields.description: A tool for giants. Can chop through even the hardest materials.

fields.name: Crescent Axe
fields.description: A massive but thin axe with a long curved beard.

fields.name: Black Crest Axe
fields.description: Made for cutting through foes larger than oneself. Once per round when one of its primary damage die roll maximum damage on a light attack against a creature, that creatures stance is broken and they lose 2d4 FP.

fields.name: Wood Club
fields.description: A basic wooden club.

fields.name: War Pick
fields.description: A war hammer with a sharp elongated head.

fields.name: Reinforced Club
fields.description: A club wrapped in reinforced metal.

fields.name: Morning Star
fields.description: A barbaric hammer with jagged metal thorns.

fields.name: Ivory Mace
fields.description: A cold ivory hammer. Infused with the winds of the north

fields.name: Divine Maul
fields.description: A large hammer infused with a miraculous crackling light.

fields.name: Great Club
fields.description: A massive log of wood, reshaped for crushing flesh.

fields.name: Great War Pick
fields.description: A great hammer with an elongated head that pulls the air into harsh currents. Can split entire boulders in two.

fields.name: Geode Crusher
fields.description: A peculiar great hammer, imbued with gravitational energy.

fields.name: Dragon’s Tooth
fields.description: The tooth of what was once surely a massive dragon. Increases magic, fire, and lightining resistance by one tier when wielded.

fields.name: Silver Anvil Great Hammer
fields.description: A gargantuan hammer with immaculate weight distribution. Quakes the earth and deals 1d12 physical damage to all creatures within 5 feet of your target, excluding yourself.

fields.name: Chained Breaker (Great Hammer)
fields.description: A massive spiked ball ham- mer with a wrapped chain that can unwind into a heavy whip. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the great hammer form of this weapon, extends the attacks range to be equal to the range of the whip form of the weapon. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the whip form of this weapon, increases the attacks damage die to a d12.

fields.name: Chained Breaker (Whip)
fields.description: A massive spiked ball ham- mer with a wrapped chain that can unwind into a heavy whip. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the great hammer form of this weapon, extends the attacks range to be equal to the range of the whip form of the weapon. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the whip form of this weapon, increases the attacks damage die to a d12.

fields.name: Bladed Quarterstaff
fields.description: A staff shoddily outfitted with blades on either end. Can be effective is swung with practice.

fields.name: Twinblade
fields.description: A well made wood and metal twinblade. Requires skill and experience to wield effectively in battle.

fields.name: Root Helix Blades
fields.description: A twinblade with two twisted wooden blades of unnaturally hard wood. The blades carry a pestilent mold which deals large amount of poison build up

fields.name: Knights Twinblade
fields.description: A well balanced twinblade. A deft hand can use it to effectively charge into battle.

fields.name: Stone Twinblade
fields.description: Twinblade made from hard stone and styled with a dark finish. Heavy, but carries power into its attacks and can launch its wielder into battle.

fields.name: Curved Twinblade
fields.description: A curved twinblade with flowing attacks which come from all angles.

fields.name: Red Iron Twinblade
fields.description: Made of a strange metal which continually rusts from its own acidity. Causes quick festering wounds, but takes 1 durability loss every hour.

fields.name: Dragon Kin Twinblade
fields.description: Said to be crafted with the scales of a dragon. Cuts through the air with little resistance. Allows its wielder to cast the sorcery Twisted Wall of Light from this weapon after using the Spin Slash weapon skill, for only 1 AP, once per short rest.

fields.name: Platinum Twinblade
fields.description: A shining heavy twinblade. Its blades glow even in the darkest depths and can light up the area around its wielder. Grants use of the weapon feat ”Incan- descence” when wielded

fields.name: Short Spear
fields.description: Basic army spear.

fields.name: War Banner
fields.description: Inspiring spear of war.

fields.name: Rot Spear
fields.description: Thick wooden lance, infused with a deep rot.

fields.name: Runic Spear
fields.description: Serrated long spear with runic symbols.

fields.name: Scraping Spear
fields.description: Spear lined with tearing teeth. Once per round in combat you can add 1d2 durability damage to one of this weapons attacks.

fields.name: Demons Tailspear
fields.description: Spear made of an ancient demon’s tail. Drips with flames.

fields.name: Spear Driver (Spear)
fields.description: A wrist mounted contraption which crackles with lightning. It serves as a hard hitting fist weapon, but also launches out a piercing tip to become a spring loaded spear. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the spear form of this weapon, causes it to deal an additional primary damage die of damage and changes the attacks damage into lightning.

fields.name: Spear Driver (Fist)
fields.description: A wrist mounted contraption which crackles with lightning. It serves as a hard hitting fist weapon, but also launches out a piercing tip to become a spring loaded spear. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the spear form of this weapon, causes it to deal an additional primary damage die of damage and changes the attacks damage into lightning.

fields.name: Halberd
fields.description: A basic halberd wielded by guards and trained soldiers.

fields.name: Crest Hilted Halberd
fields.description: An officers halberd, with a hilt design befitting its wielders sta- tion.

fields.name: Crescent Blade Halberd
fields.description: A thin and sharp bladed halberd with odd balance. Con- tains a small bell within its pommel which soothes and heals its wielder when focused upon.

fields.name: Crystaline Halberd
fields.description: Made of magic residue from the casting of powerful sorceries. This halberd also functions as a sorcery casting implement with a D scaling in Int, becoming C scaling for sorceries with 14 or more Int requirements, and B scaling for 18 or more int requirements. Once per short rest allows for an FP free cast- ing of the sorcery Crystal Hail, even if it is not attuned.

fields.name: Mad Mans Crucifix
fields.description: An executioners halberd with an old skeleton impaled and twisted into its frame. It is said that the skeleton speaks to those who wield the weapon ef- fectively.

fields.name: Lightbreak River
fields.description: A heavy bearded halberd which cuts bolts of lightning through the air with its swings.

fields.name: Split Glaive
fields.description: Masterfully forged halberd with a split blade. Hard to wield, but commands the respect of others when used in battle.

fields.name: Light Combat Scythe
fields.description: A short reaper that is lighter in hand, calling for more acro- batic manuvers, and requiring skill to swing

fields.name: Great Scythe
fields.description: A long sharp reaper. An odd choice for battle, but in the right hands can strike fear in the hearts of enemies.

fields.name: Winged Scythe
fields.description: A polearm with a curled and holy winged blade. Slices through the air leaving phan- tom trails behind.

fields.name: Twin Rime Cutters
fields.description: A set of two smaller reapers. Can be dual wielded which adds 1d4 frost to every second attack made with these weapons.

fields.name: Corvian Reaper
fields.description: A large reaper made with a lighter metal to be more easily wielded in battle.

fields.name: Executioners Glaive
fields.description: A heavy reaper used for beheading. Retains memory of its executioner duty and regenerates it wielder 1d4 FP from each fallen foe in combat.

fields.name: Kraken’s Blue Scepter
fields.description: The blue scythe of a Kraken’s followers. Allows one to travel the Kraken’s domain unimpeded.

fields.name: Leather Whip
fields.description: A basic but heavy leather whip. Not normally used for combat.

fields.name: Witches Locks
fields.description: A strange whip made from strands of black material. Said to be the hair of a chaos witch.

fields.name: Spotted Whip
fields.description: A thin whip infused with ceaseless rot. Difficult to control but leaves festering wounds.

fields.name: Notched Whip
fields.description: A metallic whip with cutting spines. Unbalanced, but leaves deep cuts

fields.name: Tight Knotted Combat Whip
fields.description: A meticulously constructed combat whip. Great for damaging lightly armored foes. Grants the use of the weapon feat ”Quick Kill” when wielded.

fields.name: Flailing Cross (Whip)
fields.description: A whip with a long and complex handle which can pull apart and bend into a crossbow with 30 feet of range. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the crossbow form of this weapon, doubles the range of the attack. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the whip form of this weapon, deals an additional 2d6 bleed build up.

fields.name: Flailing Cross (Crossbow)
fields.description: A whip with a long and complex handle which can pull apart and bend into a crossbow with 30 feet of range. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the crossbow form of this weapon, doubles the range of the attack. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the whip form of this weapon, deals an additional 2d6 bleed build up.

fields.name: Crossbow
fields.description: A standard soldiers crossbow. Can be reloaded quickly with some focus. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Grme Crossbow
fields.description: A well built and reinforced crossbow. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Multi-String Crossbow
fields.description: A complex crossbow with multiple pulleys. Requires good strength to draw. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Heavy Crossbow
fields.description: A large and heavy crossbow. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Hand Ballista
fields.description: A large crossbow which can be mistaken for a ballista by those who lack the strength and imagination. 40 foot range

fields.name: Repeating Crossbow
fields.description: A crossbow which is built to fire two bolts at once. When firing two bolts deal an extra d6 physical damage. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Shortbow
fields.description: A shortbow that can be fired rapidly with a steady hand. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Snapping Shortbow
fields.description: A small but well made shortbow that can be folded and concealed easily, with blades hidden in its frame. An obvi- ous choice for a bandit. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Composite Bow
fields.description: Short bow which emphasizes power, yet allows for quick shots. 30 foot range.

fields.name: Longbow
fields.description: Standard issue longbow. Great for back line fighting. 60 foot range.

fields.name: Black String Bow
fields.description: Bound with a powerful string and perfectly worked wood. Fires arrows far, but also with speed and power. 60 foot range.

fields.name: Eastern Greatbow
fields.description: A very long bow which can fire relatively fast with the right amount of strength. Its power greatly reflects its wielder. 100 foot range.

fields.name: Fine Wood Greatbow
fields.description: A massive but elegant bow made with quality treated wood. 100 foot range

fields.name: Dragon Spine Greatbow
fields.description: A massive bow made with the spine of a leviathan creature. 100 foot range.

fields.name: Puppeted Greatbow
fields.description: Two large metal pieces which seemingly float together to form the frame of a great bow. A quiet flame within adds fire damage to its attacks regardless of the type of arrow fired, and allows for its arrow to fracture and explode on impact. 100 foot range

fields.name: Metallic Greatbow
fields.description: An uncommon great bow made of a strange pliable alloy. Requires great strength to draw, but provides unparalleled firing speed. 100 foot range.

fields.name: Great Snake Sling
fields.description: A ballista made fast and economically. Easier to use than most other ballista and still packs a punch. 30 to 300 feet range.

fields.name: Personal Catapult
fields.description: A smaller catapult which can be mounted, loaded, and fired by one person, assuming they have the strength. Can be loaded with almost anything providing its user has the focus. 30 to 300 feet range.

fields.name: Canon
fields.description: A full canon which can be folded and carried on ones back. Built to fire great bolts at incredible speed and great destructive power. 30 to 300 feet range.

fields.name: Siege Engine
fields.description: A mounted and mechanized weapon of war with a gear sys- tem and counter weight used to release great bolts with mas- sive force. Slow, but difficult for its enemies to overcome due to its protective plates. Gives its wielder one tier of physical resistance as protection. 30 to 300 feet range.

fields.name: Scorpion
fields.description: A well engineered machine capable of firing fast and, under the right operator, without compromising power. Can be mounted and fire almost anything, due to its sleek and adaptable design. 30 to 300 feet range.

fields.name: Dragon Piercer
fields.description: A ballista said to capable of bringing down castles and pining a flying dragon to the ground. Simply being able to wield it makes one worthy of legend. 30 to 300 feet range.

fields.name: Hunters Pistol
fields.description: Basic functional gun. 20 foot range, 1 bullet capacity.

fields.name: Repeating Pistol
fields.description: A complex gun with two barrels. 15 foot range, 2 bullet ca- pacity.

fields.name: Long Rifle
fields.description: A precisely shaped gun with a long barrel. Fires accurately and with power. 20 foot range, 1 bullet capacity.

fields.name: Holy Rifle
fields.description: A cross barrel rifle that can also be used as a talisman cast- ing implement with a D scaling in Fai, becoming C scaling for miracles with 14 or more Fai re- quirements, and B scaling for 18 or more Fai requirements. 20 foot range, 1 bullet capacity.

fields.name: Blunderbuss
fields.description: Thick crude gun. 15 foot range, 1 bullet capacity.

fields.name: Thick Shotgun
fields.description: Thick gun made to rain a hail of bullets. 15 foot range, 1 bullet capacity.

fields.name: Hand Canon
fields.description: Arm mounted canon. Ridiculous weight and staggering kick. 20 foot range, 3 bullet capacity but each shot costs 3 bullet

fields.name: Gatling Gun
fields.description: A spinning chamber of flying projectiles. Can hardly bare the forces of its own usage, causing misfires to instead deal 2d4 durability damage to it. 15 foot range, 4 bullet capacity and each reload action reloads up to 4 bullets at a time.

fields.name: Buckler
fields.description: Small shield. Useful to deflect attacks.

fields.name: Greatroot Wood Shield
fields.description: Small wood shield. Also grants +2 poison and toxic res while wielded.

fields.name: Knights Shield
fields.description: Durable metal shield. Can even be used to deflect elemental at- tacks with its weapon skill.

fields.name: Grooved Sigil Shield
fields.description: A metal shield with multiple grooves that catch small attacks. Its grooves form a old sigil pattern which allow it to also innately block magic damage.

fields.name: Black Crest Shield
fields.description: Black metal long shield. Also innately blocks fire element damage.

fields.name: Mirror Shield
fields.description: A pristine shield of crystalline glass. Also innately blocks fire and magic element dam- age. Once per short rest, as a reaction, you may reflect a spell which was blocked by this shield and dealt only magic or fire damage, back towards its caster.

fields.name: Great Shield
fields.description: Full body steel shield. Provides great defense.

fields.name: Enchanted Wood Great Shield
fields.description: An oddly wielded great shield. Also innately blocks lightning element damage.

fields.name: Spiked Wall Great Shield
fields.description: A great shield embossed with large spikes. When making a shield bash attack with this weapon, as per the ’Shield Bash” weapon feat, you may add 1d6 bleed build up

fields.name: Enraged Visage Shield
fields.description: A metal shield fashioned to look like an enraged demons face. Also innately blocks fire element damage.

fields.name: Towering Gyrm Great Shield
fields.description: Immaculately crafted tower shield. Increases max HP by 2*(Vit mod) while wielded.

fields.name: Sundering Gate (Great Shield)
fields.description: A massive shield with sharpened edges and an extending handle which allows it to be wielded as a double sided greataxe. You may only make trip weapon swap attacks into the greatshield form of the weapon if you have the Shield Bash weapon feat. Swapping into the greatshield form of the weapon, after attacking with the greataxe form, allows you to raise the shield for no additional AP cost. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the greataxe form of this weapon, allows you to regenerate 1d2 poise status damage

fields.name: Sundering Gate (Great Axe)
fields.description: A massive shield with sharpened edges and an extending handle which allows it to be wielded as a double sided greataxe. You may only make trip weapon swap attacks into the greatshield form of the weapon if you have the Shield Bash weapon feat. Swapping into the greatshield form of the weapon, after attacking with the greataxe form, allows you to raise the shield for no additional AP cost. Making a trick weapon swap attack, into the greataxe form of this weapon, allows you to regenerate 1d2 poise status damage

fields.name: Sorcerers Staff
fields.description: The basic staff of an academic.

fields.name: Mendicants Staff
fields.description: Staff of a learned healer. Can be used to cast miracles with 14 or less faith requirements, as though it was a talisman.

fields.name: Runic Sand Staff
fields.description: Staff embossed with runes of a desert dwelling culture. Int scaling increased to C on spells with 16 or more Int require- ments.

fields.name: Heretics Staff
fields.description: A dark staff, attuned to the deep recesses of humanities focus. Can also cast talisman Hexes. Both int and Fai scaling only used together when casting Hexes. Fai/Int scaling is increased to C for spells with 14 or more Fai/Int requirements, B Fai/Int scaling on 16 or more Fai/Int requirements.

fields.name: Corvian Feathered Staff
fields.description: Decorated staff said to be imbued with the power of a massive crow. Int scaling increased to C on spells with 14 or more Int requirements. Increased to B on spells with 16 or more Int requirements.

fields.name: Great Heretics Staff
fields.description: A staff for experts of Hexes, and those very familiar with the dark abyss. Can also cast talisman Hexes. Both int and Fai scaling only used together when casting Hexes. Fai/Int scaling is increased to C for spells with 14 or more Fai/Int requirements, B Fai/Int scaling on 16 or more Fai/Int req, A Fai/Int scaling on 18 or more Fai/Int requirements.

fields.name: Arch Mages Staff
fields.description: Staff of a master sorcerer. Int scaling becomes C for 14 or more Int req on spell, B for 16 or more, A for 18 or more, S for 20 or more.

fields.name: Rod of Storms
fields.description: Staff which calls forth great storms. Also used as a powerful talisman. Int scaling only used when casting sorceries and Faith scaling only when casting miracles. Fai/Int scaling is increased to C for spells with 14 or more Fai/Int requirements, B Fai scaling on 16 or more Fai req, A Fai scaling on 18 or more Fai requirements. Grants the weapon feat ”intercept” to the wielder, and allows dark ranged attacks to be intercepted by lightning ranged attacks..

fields.name: Talisman
fields.description: A basic commoners talisman. Used to meditate and bring hope

fields.name: Canvas Talisman
fields.description: A talisman wrapped with basic canvas. Used to concentrate and humble oneself in the eyes of greater beings. Fai scaling increased to C on spells with 17 or more Fai requirements.

fields.name: Rune Canvas Talisman
fields.description: A talisman wrapped with rune drawn canvas. Its runes speak of legendary tales. Fai scaling increased to C on spells with 15 or more Fai requirements.

fields.name: White Hair Talisman
fields.description: Said to be made of the hair of a chaos witch. Can also be used to cast pyromancy spells, and its Int scaling is only included when casting them. Fai scaling increased to C on spells with 15 or more Fai requirements.

fields.name: Saints Talisman
fields.description: Colorfully wrapped chiming bell. Used by those with True faith in miracles. Fai scaling in- creased to C on spells with 14 or more Fai requirements. In- creased to B on spells with 16 or more Fai requirements.

fields.name: Pale Sun Talisman
fields.description: A pale talisman which calms its user before allowing them to unleash legendary miracles and storms of lightning. Fai scaling becomes C for 14 or more Fai req on spell, B for 16 or more, A for 18 or more, S for 20 or more.

fields.name: Dark Crystal Chime
fields.description: A chime made entirely from an opaque black crystal. Can also cast pyro flame Hexes. Both int and Fai scaling only used together when casting Hexes. Fai/Int scaling is increased to C for spells with 14 or more Fai/Int requirements, B Fai/Int scaling on 16 or more Fai/Int req, A Fai/Int scaling on 18 or more Fai/Int requirements.

fields.name: Pyromancy Flame
fields.description: A small flame held in hand. The frenzy and chaos of arti- ficial flame brings about great potential.

fields.name: Soothing Flame
fields.description: A warm white and red flame. Staring deeply into its light can provide hope. Increases faith scaling to C when casting spells with 14 or more faith require- ments.

fields.name: Blue Flame
fields.description: A blue crackling flame to be held in hand. Can also cast sorceries, but using only its Int scaling. Increases Int scaling to C when casting spells with 14 or more Int requirements.

fields.name: Tainted Green Flame
fields.description: Said to be an old chaos flame which was tainted by a poison dragon. Can stir up molded earth and gravel to shield its wielder through its weapon skill. Anytime you deal poison or toxic build up to a creature other than your- self, while wielding this flame, you deal one additional poison or toxic build up respectively. Fai/Int scaling is increased to C for spells with 14 or more Fai/Int requirements, B Fai/Int scaling on 16 or more Fai/Int requirements.

fields.name: Parting Flame
fields.description: A parting flame is said to be created when a regular pyro- mancy flame is gifted to a loved one which has passed away. Its white and yellow flames burn bright from the sorrow and lost love of its past owner. Once per short rest grants an FP free casting of the spell Warmth, regardless of if you have it attuned. Fai/Int scaling is increased to C for spells with 14 or more Fai/Int requirements, B Fai/Int scaling on 16 or more Fai/Int requirements.

fields.name: Chaos Flame
fields.description: Writhing with chaotic life of its own. This flame can only be held by master py- romancers. Once per short rest grants an FP free casting of both the spells Chaos Firestorm and Lava Wave, regardless of if you have the spells attuned. Fai/Int scaling is increased to C for spells with 14 or more Fai/Int requirements, B Fai/Int scaling on 16 or more Fai/Int requirements, A Fai/Int scaling on 18 or more Fai/Int requirements.

fields.name: Spirit Crucible
fields.description: A small crumbling stone crucible. Contains the power to hold spirits within. Scaling is increased based on the tier of spirit summoned. Tier 1: D Int, D Fai. Tier 2: D Int, D Fai. Tier 3: C Int, C Fai. Tier 4: C Int, C Fai.

fields.name: Runic Spirit Crucible
fields.description: A small stone crucible, rein- forced with strange runes to help draw forth its spirits. Scaling is increased based on the tier of spirit summoned. Tier 1: D Int, D Fai. Tier 2: C Int, C Fai. Tier 3: C Int, C Fai. Tier 4: B Int, B Fai.

fields.name: Silver Spirit Vessel
fields.description: A hand held cube vessel of fine silver. Substantially adds ones own power to the spirits it summons. Scaling is increased based on the tier of spirit sum- moned. Tier 1: C Int, C Fai. Tier 2: C Int, C Fai. Tier 3: B Int, B Fai. Tier 4: B Int, B Fai.

fields.name: Lord Vessel
fields.description: Replica of a legendary vessel, but made to be held in hand. Said to have once held even the most powerful spirits. Scaling is increased based on the tier of spirit summoned. Tier 1: C Int, C Fai. Tier 2: C Int, C Fai. Tier 3: B Int, B Fai. Tier 4: A Int, A Fai.
